00036 class Variable extends BDDRecord
00037 {
00038 //----------------------------------------------------------------- PUBLIC
00039 
00040 //--------------------------------------------------------- public methods
00041     public function Validate ( $siteTable )
00067         {
00068                 $errors = new Errors ();
00069         
00070                 // variable name
00071                         if ( empty( $this->row[ TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_NAME ] ) )
00072                         {
00073                                 $errors->Add ( new VariableError ( VariableError::VARIABLE_NAME_EMPTY, 'Please fill in variable name.') );
00074                         }
00075         
00076                 // scope
00077                         if ( $this->row[ TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_SCOPE ] != TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_SCOPE_SERVER && $this->row[ TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_SCOPE ] != TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_SCOPE_SITE  )
00078                         {
00079                                 $errors->Add ( new VariableError ( VariableError::VARIABLE_SCOPE_INCORRECT, 'Variable scope is incorrect.') );
00080                         }
00081                 
00082                 // access
00083                         if ( $this->row[ TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_ACCESS ] != TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_ACCESS_ROOT && $this->row[ TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_ACCESS ] != TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_ACCESS_ADMIN )
00084                         {
00085                                 $errors->Add ( new VariableError ( VariableError::VARIABLE_ACCESS_INCORRECT, 'Variable access are not correctly defined.') );
00086                         }
00087                 
00088                 // referent IdSite
00089                         if ( ! @in_array( 'TableSiteInterface', class_implements ( $siteTable ) ) )
00090                         {
00091                                 $errors->Add( new BDDError ( BDDError::TABLE_CLASS_INCORRECT , 'Parameter is not a good instance of BDDTableSite.' ) );
00092                         } 
00093                         else
00094                         {       
00095                                 if ( ! $siteTable->IdSiteExists( $this->row[ TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_IDSITE ]  ) )
00096                                 {
00097                                         $errors->Add ( new VariableError ( VariableError::VARIABLE_IDSITE_INEXISTANT, 'Variable does not refer to any site.') );
00098                                 }
00099                         }
00100                 
00101                 // result
00102                 if ( $errors->GetCount() == 0 )
00103                 {
00104                         $this->isValid = true;
00105                         return NULL;            
00106                 }
00107                 
00108                 
00109                 $this->isValid = false;
00110                 return $errors;
00111         } //---- End of Validate
00112         
00113 
00114 //---------------------------------------------- Constructors - destructor
00115 
00116     function __construct( BDDRecord $newRec )
00125     {
00126                 parent::__construct( NULL );
00127                 
00128                 // initialization
00129                 $this->SetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_IDVARIABLE , NULL );
00130                 $this->SetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_NAME , NULL );
00131                 $this->SetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_DATA , NULL );
00132                 $this->SetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_SCOPE , TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_SCOPE_SITE );
00133                 $this->SetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_ACCESS , TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_ACCESS_ADMIN );
00134                 $this->SetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_IDSITE , NULL );
00135         
00136                         
00137                 if ( $newRec != NULL )
00138                 {
00139                         $obj = (array)( $newRec);
00140                         
00141                         $this->row = array_merge ( $this->row, $obj[chr(0).'*'.chr(0).'row'] );
00142                         // php hack to access protected property $newRec->row
00143                 }
00144     } //---- End of constructor
00145         
00146     function __destruct( )
00150         {
00151                 parent::__destruct();
00152         } //----- End of Destructor
